title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - 21/05/2015
body:
Summoners,

**TL;DR - The Oceanic League of Legends service will be offline for maintenance on 21/05/2015 from 4am to 8am AEST.  **

Starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for the maintenance. At 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 4 hours.  Please keep an eye on the [server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) for up-to-date information.

UPDATE:

8:00 AEST - We have extended the downtime for this maintenance as some aspects are taking slightly longer than originally anticipated. We are estimating the extended downtime will be for another 2 hours. Please keep an eye on http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce for any updates.

Agent Mindstar

replies.body:
SO the purchase RP button in the store crashes the client ?? 

Tested on 3 different machines on 2 different connections.
Letting everyone know. The oce server is back up!! xD

"We are estimating the extended downtime will be for another 2 hours. Please keep an eye on http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce for any updates."

Guys, even your status page doesn't even feel like loading today.
anyone know if the servers will be up for 8am?
not too sure man i'm trying too find that out myself! :c
well its 8am now, and they're still not up yet; i just want to play a game before work :/{{item:3070}}

its 8.30am and still not online.. :c
shouldnt be too long now though xD

Hey Rito what the ffuckk is wrong with the servers... I was raging mad to fellow players for disconnecting  and reconnecting today (20-05-2015 time 08:00-08:30). 

very pissed.
